info.description: This is a sample server for managing data based on the provided schema.
info.title: Your API Title

get.description: Retrieve a list of all balance sheet records

post.description: Add a new balance sheet record to the database
post.summary: Create a new balance sheet entry

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific balance sheet record using its ID
get.summary: Get a single balance sheet entry by ID

404.description: Not Found - Balance Sheet not found

put.description: Modify the details of an existing balance sheet record by ID
put.summary: Update an existing balance sheet entry

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID format or input data

404.description: Not Found - Balance Sheet not found

delete.description: Remove a balance sheet record from the database using its ID
delete.summary: Delete a balance sheet entry by ID

404.description: Not Found - Balance Sheet not found
